title: Poster, "Dead Man", 1995
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: In black and white: against the background of a snow-covered forest, a face-on close-up of a man with chin-length hair, kohled eyes, and zigzags painted on his cheeks, squinting and aiming a pistol.  Below, the inscription: the title "DEAD MEN" in white, stylized bone-shaped letters. Followed by "JOHNNY DEPP", credits in small type, and "A  JIM JARMUSCH FILM" in a gold band.
